info.name: Pruebas Continuidad VISA CREDITO
info.description:
# API de Pago con Tarjeta (v4)

---

La API de pago soporta:

- Account Status Inquiry
- PreAuthorization Request
- PreAuthorization Cancel
- PreAuthorization Incremental
- PreAuthorization Completion
- PreAuthorization Delayed
- Purchase
- Refund
    

Reversas para solicitar en caso de error

- PreAuthorization
- PreAuthorization Cancel
- PreAuthorization Completion
- PreAuthorization Delayed
- Purchase
- Refund

exec: for (var i = length; i > 0; --i) result += chars[Math.round(Math.random() * (chars.length - 1))];
